Beaners (honorific name for a Mexican, praising the healthy tint of his skin) believe that they are the children of Quetzalcoatl, the Aztec sky and creation god. Truth be told, however, they are a half-caste product of their parents fucking (those Mexicans do so much fucking, amirite?).
